description.ko: 죽어가는 별들의 빛으로 우주의 직물이 짜여지는, 생성과 파멸에 대한 우주적 규모의 비전입니다.
description.en: A cosmic scale vision of creation and destruction, where the fabric of the universe is spun from the light of dying stars.

prompt: A colossal cosmic loom made of dark matter filaments, weaving a tapestry of vibrant purple nebulae and dense star clusters across the infinite void. At the center, a spinning event horizon distorts the light of surrounding pulsars, creating a majestic sense of cosmic horror. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing. Volumetric gas clouds with intricate star dust textures and global illumination from a distant supernova. The scale is immense, focusing on the silent majesty and the terrifying beauty of the deep abyss.
